Function Documentation

static int ctk_task_barrier_wait ( ctk_barrier_ea_t  barrier  )  [inline, static]

Waits at a barrier - please use this one instead of ctk_barrier_wait if synchronizing SPE tasks may not run parallelly on the multiple SPEs (thus needs yield before blocking at the barrier).

static int ctk_task_exec ( ea_addr_t  image,
unsigned long long  arg1,
unsigned long long  arg2 
) [inline, static]

Execs a new SPE task on this SPE. The current task will be overwritten and never returns from the call.

Parameters:
[in] image - the task image (created by ctk_task_image_create or ctk_task_image_open)
[in] arg1 - the 2nd arg for the new task
[in] arg2 - the 3rd arg for the new task

static int ctk_task_exit ( unsigned long long  ret  )  [inline, static]

Exit the current SPE task (note: if the application directly calls exit() instead of ctk_task_exit, the SPE task runtime itself exits. Do not call exit() directly unless you are aware of what you are doing.)

Parameters:
[in] ret - the return code

static int ctk_task_genericq_deq ( ctk_genericq_ea_t  queue,
void *  item 
) [inline, static]

Deques on a generic queue with yield - if dequeue fails, it yields the SPE resource to other SPE tasks

static int ctk_task_genericq_enq ( ctk_genericq_ea_t  queue,
void *  item 
) [inline, static]

Enqueues on a generic queue with yield - if enqueue fails, it yields the SPE resource to other SPE tasks

static int ctk_task_init_env ( unsigned long long  runtime_envp  )  [inline, static]

Initializes the task environment and returns my task ID

static int ctk_task_queue_deq ( ctk_queue_ea_t  queue,
ctk_queue_item_t *  item 
) [inline, static]

Deques on a queue with yield - if dequeue fails, it yields the SPE resource to other SPE tasks

static int ctk_task_queue_enq ( ctk_queue_ea_t  queue,
ctk_queue_item_t  item 
) [inline, static]

Enqueues on a queue with yield - if enqueue fails, it yields the SPE resource to other SPE tasks

static int ctk_task_spawn ( ea_addr_t  task,
unsigned long long  arg1,
unsigned long long  arg2 
) [inline, static]

Spawns a new SPE task on this SPE. The new created task will be enqueued to the run queue and eventually called.

Parameters:
[in] task - the task reference, which should not already be running or in the run queue.
[in] arg1 - the 2nd arg for the new task
[in] arg2 - the 3rd arg for the new task

static int ctk_task_yield (  )  [inline, static]

Yield the SPE ask and may switch to the new task

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error
